option.name: originalContent
option.value:
package model
type User struct { ID uint gorm:"primaryKey;autoIncrement" Username string gorm:"size:100;not null;unique" PasswordHash string gorm:"size:255;not null" Email string gorm:"size:150;unique" CreatedAt time.Time gorm:"autoCreateTime" }

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
package model
type User struct { ID uint `gorm:"primaryKey;autoIncrement"` Username string `gorm:"size:100;not null;unique"` PasswordHash string `gorm:"size:255;not null"` Email string `gorm:"size:150;unique"` CreatedAt time.Time `gorm:"autoCreateTime"` }
